subtitle: Frontend Developer
p1: Hi, Iâ€™m a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Hannover. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.

p5: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
p6: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
